Independent Samples T-test — independentSamplesTTest
text: data Data frame containing data. dependent Character vector. Specify columns contain dependent variable. groupBy Character. Specify grouping variable.

title: Independent Samples T-test — independentSamplesTTest
code: independentSamplesTTest(data = sleep, dependent = "extra", groupBy = "group") #> $ttest #>   dependent         t       df          p #> 1     extra -1.860813 17.77647 0.07939414 #>
